Graph Theory, Winter 23/24

Instructor

  • Tuan Tran

  • Office: 1409, Management Building, East Campus

  • E-mail: trantuan [at] ustc [dot] edu [dot] cn

Time

Monday 14:00-15:35 and Friday 15:55-17:30, in 5301.

Topics of the course

  • Basic notions
  • Trees
  • Connectivity
  • Eulerian and Hamiltonian cycles
  • Matchings
  • Planar graphs
  • Graph colourings
  • The matrix tree theorem
  • Kuratowskiâ€™s theorem
  • Ramsey theory
  • Extremal problems

Prerequisites

Basic linear algebra, calculus.

Requirements

Here you can read the requirements and formalities of the course.

Exams

  • Midterm: November 10th, 4PM - 5:30PM
  • Final: January 10th, 7:30PM - 9:30PM, Classroom 5204.
